body_html:
BTW, I finally solved this problem by re-installing correct GPU device driver for Ubuntu 14.04.
My Ubuntu version is 14.04, but I mistakely installed device driver for Ubuntu 15.x. So everytime it hangs on starting tensorflow Session.

body:
BTW, I finally solved this problem by re-installing correct GPU device driver for Ubuntu 14.04.
My Ubuntu version is 14.04, but I mistakely installed device driver for Ubuntu 15.x. So everytime it hangs on starting tensorflow Session.
